sourcesContent:
export const spotifyButton = {
  background: '#1DB954',
  border: 'none',
  borderRadius: '30px',
  boxShadow: '0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)',
  color: 'white',
  cursor: 'pointer',
  fontSize: '14px',
  fontWeight: 'bold',
  padding: '12px 24px',
  transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
  textTransform: 'uppercase',

  };

  export const appleButton = {
    borderRadius: '20px',

      
      backgroundColor: '#1DB954',
        color: '#FFFFFF',
        padding: '10px 20px',
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
        cursor: 'pointer',
  };
